website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a serious 3-day cleanse and don't mind the price, this product will deliver noticeable results for most users.
pros: A 3-day cleanse that's conveniently packaged – individual juice packets with cold-pressed vegetable and fruit juices
No artificial ingredients, no mixing required
cons: It's pricey, and comes with mixed reviews of the flavor – some consumers like, while others weren't impressed

customer_reviews.title: 10 lbs in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. It was my first time doing a juice cleanse and I was a bit nervous but once I started it was smooth sailing. I wasn't hungry because you drink a juice every two hours. I peed a lot and was in the bathroom often but nothing violent. The only time I wanted food was if I smelled it. After my three day cleanse I am down 10 lbs and I feel great. Can't wait to do it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First timer and so happy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I had done a juice cleanse of any kind. I was nervous to do three days but I have hardly had an issue. It is of course tough around lunch time since everyone in the office eats yummy smelling foods but once that has passed it was smooth sailing! Peed a LOT might be a little bothersome but so much liquid you should kind of expect it. I am starting a new diet regime tomorrow so did this to get cleaned out for it! Worked like a charm and lost 4lbs probably mostly from bloating. I feel amazing and ready to tackle this new challenge. Will be using this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan McPhee

customer_reviews.title: not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as expected and CS responded to an inquiry I had about the products. Also 3 day cleanse helped and I did notice a difference. As for taste of the juices, not bad at all. Definitely went down without a problem, Would order again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Giants

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about juicing at all. I have done this twice and have not only reset my metabolism, but have lost and kept off 10lbs. My stomach bloat has gone down, and I went from a tight 10 to an 8! I admittedly cheated at dinnertime with the 1 cup of fresh veg, but the 9pm juice is very satisfying and I slept great. If you want to start a more healthy living this is the way to go. Sugar cravings are GONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bell

customer_reviews.title: HEAR ME OUT!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I would consider purchasing again however I would NOT recommend to folks. CON! - WHY IS THERE PICKLE JUICE in all but one of these!?!?! Unnecessary. MANY people do not like the taste of pickles and it takes over the flavor. "Mango Peppermint green tea" YOU DO NOT NEED PICKLE in that. PRO: Woman-Owned NON-GMO Gluten-Free 100% Recyclable packaging Clean ingredients Satisfying as a meal Low calorie / High nutrients No added sugar No preservatives No concentrates BUT WHY PICKLES
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUSreview

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but this was so great! It wasn't easy, but I'm glad I did it. I usually eat low carb and hate juice, so this was really a challenge for me, but I found these not too sweet and tasted great! I was hungry, but I did HIIT and ran 4 miles/day, so that's not surprising. It got me jump started for my New Year's resolution, I lost all my 7 lbs of my holiday weight gain and it's put me on track. I will definitely do it again!
customer_reviews.author: runner73

customer_reviews.title: Very natural and wholesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm half way through my 3rd, and last, day. The cleanse is very natural and has been easy on my body. This is my first cleanse. It's convenient to not have to worry about meal prep for 3 days, ha! I think it's reasonably priced considering the high grade of ingredients & convenience. Ginger isn't my favorite...kinda strong for my taste buds...but by the 2nd day I had actually adjusted. All in all it's been a pleasant experience, my body likes it and I don't find myself even craving bad food. As you as you feel hunger it's time for another pouch! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HonestShopper

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try - You wont regret it!
customer_reviews.text: The best product to start my Covid19 weight loss journey! I picked up weight since Covid19, and starting my weight loss journey. I'm not gonna lie, it was ROUGH not eating for 3 days - and honestly I didnt - I ate a few almonds and a cup of fruit each day. But you're drinking every 2 hours so you really dont miss eating the full meals. I could see myself using this product to replace a meal at least once a week, or doing the full cleanse once a month. The tastes arent bad. Most of the products first ingredient is Apple Juice so that's the first flavor you taste. Did I lose weight - I doubt it!
customer_reviews.author: dstgirl

customer_reviews.title: It’s effective
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to “restart” my body and sort of cleanse it. It was the only cleanse so far that I’ve been successful at. It was easy and designed to fight off cravings. In fact I’m ordering it again:). I lost 3 pounds and am pleased with that! My stomach looks less bloated almost a week later!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Richer

customer_reviews.title: It tastes  great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this juice. The Blueberry Chia (Renewal) is perfect after a hard work out. It makes you feel full and not bloated! When detoxing, the duration between drinks is perfect. As soon as you feel like you might need a snack, it is time to have a drink. I love this product. Thank you! (best part is my husband tried it and was very pleased, He actually asked me to get him a3 day supply also!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Win/Win/Win/Win
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. It's made with health conscious ingredients, is great tasting, is beautifully packaged and is women owned. When I think about all the purchases I've made on Amazon in 2019, I realize that this is my favorite one...I chose to do something very significant for myself and for my health (these aren't cheap). Hope it pays off. It's sometimes hard to properly review a product when you haven't yet seen or felt results from, so I'll update my review at a later date if deemed necessary.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Pricey.... But totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to drink. By day 3 I had to force myself to drink my 6th one because I wasn’t hungry for more. I’ve done numerous juice cleanses and this one was by far the most filling and satisfying. I will say, all the juices tend to be pretty sweet and citrusy so if you are looking for more green and veggie juices, you may want to check out something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Martin

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavors of the juices. My stomach is very sensitive and with this cleanse it was very delicate process however in the end I did lose 6 lbs after using the products for 4 days. Unlike other cleanses I've used in the past were harsh on my stomach and made me feel very weak and as though I had vomited for a week straight.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this cleanse to any interested
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend this cleanse to any interested. The juices were very good and very refreshing, especially when they are really cold. It was a little tough the second day. But my husband and I did it together, so we were each others support system.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: A must do post vacation!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I went on a 2 week Mediterranean cruise. Enjoyed every culinary experience available. Unfortunately gained 6 lbs. Started the 3 day cleanse the day after I returned. Lost 4 lbs!!! The cleanse eliminated cravings and within the next week lost the remaining 2 lbs just following sensible eating. Feel energized and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience. The taste is ok. I stuck with the 3 days plan. On day 2, I did get a warm clean soup cup because I could not stand how sweet these juices are. That's the one thing that will make try something different next time. Way too much apple juice. Way too much sugar for a detox. I understand it is not "added sugar", but this thing is unnecessarily sweet for me.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!!! Can’t we recycle the pouches??
customer_reviews.text: These are the juice combos I would make for myself if I had time. I wish we didn’t live in a fast paced world, sponsored by plastic, but if you can repurpose the tops for kids projects and recycle the pouches with your towns waste management, these pouches are and this detox system is pure perfection.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: On day one of this juice cleanse, and it is all wrong. Every single juice is cloyingly sweet and the flavors are poorly balanced. Just gross. Juices didn’t even arrive refrigerated...not fresh at all. Don’t waste your money on this garbage. There are way better, way healthier cleanses out there. This one is a packaging scheme. I have no idea how I’m going to go through two more days of this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: joyinbirthing

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: These juices taste great. No added sugar, but a nice clean taste. I would recommend this product just for the taste alone. The only drawback for me would be the price, but I guess it’s because of the high quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Better tasting than all the others
customer_reviews.text: I have tried over 10 different commercially packaged detox and juice cleanse drinks. Usually the taste of celery or cucumber, the base for most drinks, is overwhelming and makes me gag. But lemonkind doesn't. The awareness, transformation are my favorite. I still struggle with the blueberry cocoa drink. But overall this company makes one that I love. I have done the 1 day cleanse 5 times in 1 year. The juice is always constantly good. I am an average person. I workout 3 days per week. Work a full time job. Average height and weight and try to eat well, but sometimes that isn't possible. The juices help reset every couple of months to keep me on track.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marshal

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have used Lemonkind a few times for the 3 day detox. I currently drink one or two pouches everyday over the last few months. My hair and nails are growing strong. I also sleep better and have more day time energy. The combination of greens and fruits in the jucie are exactly what I need at the mid day wall. I have to say the first time I did the detox I struggled with the taste and texture, now I really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie S.

customer_reviews.title: Best juice cleanse I've found!
customer_reviews.text: This juice cleanse keep you full and energized. It was a bit hard to get through the first day, but two and three were a piece of cake. I lost a couple pounds the first time to jump start my diet and the second time I lost 5. Will continue to implement in my diet for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: April Knower

customer_reviews.title: This was a GREAT experience and produced great results
customer_reviews.text: I'm a large athletic older man, run obstacle course races competitively, and usually follow a mostly paleo lifestyle. This was a GREAT experience and produced great results. I got off of my diet after the end of the racing season, and used this to kickstart my trainign for 2018. Amazingly, alot of the "bad habit" foods I onced crazed regularly are not appealing, even a day and a half into the cleanse. Most of the flavors are pleasant and I look forward to the next drink in the series each day. The "Renewal" mix is one of the best tasting ways to end the day and feel satisfiued on this cleanse. Great exerpeince, great results.
customer_reviews.author: Dv44

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do even with very little willpower
customer_reviews.text: I've never done a cleanse, but the way this is portioned out so you get a different juice every two hours was great. I only felt hungry once over three days, but I imagine that was due to attending a basketball game and all the fried food smells. Despite immersing myself in crap food central at the basketball game I persevered and completed the cleanse! I feel less bloated and ready to make good food choices once again after all my delicious, but nutritionally inept holiday choices. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy127

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have tried many juice cleanses and was never able to finish a single one. Their juices are delicious making them easy to drink. I love that there are 8 juices to drink compared to 6 in the others I have tried. I have completed multiple one day and three day cleanse and always feel like a million bucks after. It is a wonderful way to get back on track after getting a little wild with your diet. I get excited to cleanse and I enjoy getting friends involved to have a partner to help through the difficult cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how I feel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before and liked it then. I feel good overall after just one day and by the third day I feel great. I don’t buy it for weight loss, I buy to make me feel “re-synched” as it were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Juice Cleanse I’ve Ever Done
customer_reviews.text: The delicious tastes, the beautiful packaging, the healthy results are all something I’ve never experienced with other juice cleanses! I am so impressed with this juice that I will definitely do it again!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Wedge

customer_reviews.title: These taste disgusting
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. I love cucumbers, but every single one taste like a cucumber mashed up and mixed with flower petals. Seriously, that packaging is adorable, and I had such high hopes that these would taste like something other than grass...but I couldn't even make it through a whole one! I advise against....and if you think you can just plug your nose and chug it down..think again, I vomited after attempting.
customer_reviews.author: KLKS90

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely do again.....
customer_reviews.text: Some didnt taste great, but bearable. I know good nutrition doesn't always taste.the way we expect. These were wholesome ingredients and none of the extra added. It did what I expected it to do, to make me feel lighter and less bloated and a little more energized. This was the reset my body needed and will do again. I also ordered the teas to try next to keep the goodness going in my body and keep me away from bad habit foods.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't hungry
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy with the prepacked amounts of juice, and the suggestions on when to drink each one on the side of the box. Honestly, I wasn't hungry. I wanted food simply because I really like to eat. Each flavor was superb! I will absolutely do it again. I definitely feel better and it helped me to start today eating better.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Cipres

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cleansing system, easy to follow and use
customer_reviews.text: This cleanse is great. The first day is tough, but you just gulp through it knowing your gut will thank you. I bought one for my daughter to so we kept each other on track. It’s good to have a buddy, that way you can encourage each other. I also got the follow up items and will be using it for the maintenance portion. Really excited. Don’t see much of any weight loss, but I know that my body is going to be happy! Absolutely do it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good juice cleanse!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best juice cleanse I have ever used! I like it so much I did it again 4 weeks later and sent a kit to my daughter. She loved it too. By the third day I felt great!!!! First day I was a little hungry but more from habit than actual hunger. The drinks every two hours work perfectly, taste great and have fantastic ingredients. I liked the flavor of the night time drink the most.
customer_reviews.author: cristine k. stanwyck

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product. The packaging alone is extremely beautiful and detailed. The cleanse itself is easy to do and most of the juices taste surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra12

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Not thick, thin like juice. Enough to keep you filled until the next juice. Remember to drink water as well. Great for a kick start to a new diet or a detox after being sick, or just resetting your system. I noticed that the later in the day it got the more I could taste in each juice, so it was cleaning out something. I would do it again. I like the product, but maybe not 3 days ....
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Love these juices!
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the one day cleanse a while back and liked it so I decided to try the three day. It was fantastic! The flavors of the juices are great and I like the consistency differences as well. I was very concerned about doing a three day but it was really easy. I find once I get through day one the next two days are really easy! I also don’t even use all the juices per day so I have a few leftover for the next few days. I also lost 6 pounds! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT JUICES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im definitely inlove with those juices, they kept me full i was sooo surprised that i could last 4 days on just liquids... im not sure how much i lost , but i fell lighter and i still had energy. The second time around I ordered and few of the bags popped it was not pleasant. In few days rep got in contact with me and promised to fix the issue. Thank you !!!! Even tho its a little expansive it’s definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely buy these again. I've been dieting since February and I needed to jumpstart my metabolism. These were perfect for my busy life. When I did find myself getting hungry I would look at the clock and it would be time for a juice so they do a great job of keeping you satisfied. Plus I lost 4 lbs!!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Cleanse on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I live a hungry life and this is the perfect cleanse because you don't feel hungry during the process. After 3 days you feel awesome, less bloated, more energy, and a decreased appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough... I love this product... Only thing I don't like is the price. It could be a little cheaper. But hands down best stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Energy All Day Long
customer_reviews.text: I've never done a juice cleanse and I was a little scared to try one, especially for 3 days. But honestly, this was pretty amazing. I was NEVER hungry (which was one of my biggest concerns), and I had a ton of energy throughout the day. The juices are filling, and you have one every 2 hours which makes it really easy to forget you're not eating. Not only did I lose weight, but I don't have any bloating. I never leave reviews, but after trying this, it definitely deserved 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the hunger and like the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Certainly takes care of the bloat after the first day. Water loss after day 1 was 4 pounds, another 1.6 pounds after day 2 and 2 ounces after day 3. Not sure if I will do the 3 day again since I am able to eat clean on my own but after the holidays or some other gluttony filled weekend, this will be my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Over 50

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This was hard for me. The first day I was very hungry, and I supplemented with a few raspberries and a couple nuts. I woke up the 2nd day feeling pretty good so did it another day, but I was hungry and it was hard to get through the 2nd day. I was a little shaky and unfocused by the time I went to bed. I decided to save the last box and do a 1 day cleanse at another time. I did this to lose weight and to reboot my system. I feel great and lost 4 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome packaging. I actually love love love food and these juices actually left me not feeling super hungry which I was surprised at. I didn't get lightheaded or moody or sluggish. I definitely would recommend it. Best juice cleanse I've tried so far. And the flavors didn't taste horrible and weren't crazy chunky. Some had a little bit but it was more of grainy feeling. Definitely bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Darianj

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleanse!!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanse is amazing. I would recommend this to anyone ready to kickstart a permanent healthy lifestyle. I never felt hungry at all and was amazed with the mental clarity it gave me. It is pricey so I do not suggest it unless you are truly serious about making lifestyle changes.
customer_reviews.author: Trena Barrows

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Not only do the juices taste fantastic, I feel so much better! The weight loss is just icing. If I there was a way to get bulk orders, I would use these every day and live on this! I feel the best I j.g ave in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to reset and recharge!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these juices! I decided to do this cleanse after months of poor eating and some weight gain. I liked the taste and felt satisfied after each juice but having a juice every two hours was definitely necessary because I did feel hungry. Day 1 was the hardest but by days 2 and 3 my body had adjusted and I felt good. I decided to purchase another 3 day cleanse and continue for as long as could. I am on day 5 and I feel great! I should have no problem doing 6 days. I am down 4 lbs but more importantly I am not craving sweets or feeling like I want to eat everything in sight.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: All have the same taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the second juice cleanse I did, this one did not work as well as the first one, and every juice had the same taste to it which I thought odd considering they all have different things in them. I was not impressed with this juice at all, it did not help with the hunger and cravings. I did not enjoy it as much as I did my Raw cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice juice cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Did the 3-day detox. All the flavors were pretty good and I like how the box is your directions. Gives you an idea of drink order and recommended times to drink it. My absolute favorite is the last drink of the day since it tastes like cinnamon and other delicious berries.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer (verified purchaser)

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised I wasn’t hungry. By day 2 I also felt a lot better, had more energy and my face seemed to look more refreshed. This was my second time ordering the 3 day cleanse. It’s a great way to detox and lose a few lbs too.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Sumedrea

customer_reviews.title: And it was amazing! The drinks left me full and feeling energized ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first cleanse that I have ever done. And it was amazing! The drinks left me full and feeling energized and awake. I was never hungry. This was the perfect reset that I was hoping to achieve. I will definitely be doing this again. The drinks are easy to transport and stay cold. Very happy and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting juicing option out there and a lot more reasonable in price.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Jack

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanse there is. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to these cleanses because they taste so good. Plus they work to set me on track for healthier eating.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about using a cleanse - but the cleanse worked as discussed -- Not a 'weight loss' fix all but helped with the bloat and the feeling of sluggishness. Bought the three day - lost 3 pounds of water weight/bloat in first day - decided to save the other two for right before or after the holidays --- taste is good compared to others I have tried. Easy to do and you're not hungry because you drink juice every 2 hours with water in between! Good find!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Grunsted

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a bit to pricy for me. However, when I think about all the times I've bought these ingredients and tried juicing my own way, it was just as costly. The flavors were delicious. The flavors with the greens, kale,spinach, etc. Was my least favorite but tolerable. I lost 10 lbs in with the 3 day cleanse. It was hard but I made it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: 4321wanz

customer_reviews.title: Meh on flavor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the reviews were great, but the flavors were all the same and by my 5th one on the 1st day the smell made my stomach turn. The flavor was ok that the packaging is beautiful. however they all have the same flavor of cucumber, peppermint and a hint of lemon with no sweet flavor at all. This is also not filling at all, so drink a lot of water! you will feel like you have not eaten in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great 3day detox
customer_reviews.text: This detox was amazing! It was very convenient and easy to follow. The flavors of the juices were all good. By day three I felt like I could do this for another day or two. The only downside to me is the cost as I would love to add to this as a regular every other month detox but at 139 that’s not really in the budget. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a 3 day detox.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Voigt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cleanse! The first day was pretty rough .. no food and I felt like I was in a fog. The second and third day I felt amazing! Lots of energy and having I wasn’t hungry! After the 3 days I lost 6 lbs and my skin looked great! I highly recommend doing this with a friend so you can stay motivated!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Actually pretty surprised how well these work. At 250lbs and fairly active, 1100 calories a day was a pretty nerve racking thought. Never felt hungry or dehydrated. I will say that the lack of coffee on day two was a direct result of a pretty nasty headache i suffered with for most of the day. I drink a lot of coffee so normal people may fair better than I.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be scared it’s a great cleanse!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely do this again! The first day was the most difficult but I was never hungry and never missed solid food. By day 3 I was feeling great, lighter and full of energy. My only stumbling block was the strength juice. I could not get it down, it made me gag. The other juices all tasted good. I substituted strength with some greens and raw veggies. 2 days post cleanse I’m down 4 pounds and slowly adding in foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Denner

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, Convenient, Healthy, Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing a regimen like this and I was very impressed. The juices came packed in a box and are made for convenience and sustainability. There are directions on exactly what juice to drink and when. They were delicious. In 2 days, I lost 5 lbs and felt amazing. I purchased one for my mom. I am going to continue to do this on a monthly basis.
customer_reviews.author: HaynOrchid

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I did the juicing for 3 days and it went very well. I lost 5 pounds and felt amazing after. Juices taste very good and I wasn’t starving like some.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. 1. Tast was nice and it is good there are several taste so it is not getting boring. 2. Feels lighter while no feeling of hunger. 3. Love the design. 4. Comes with small bag which is very comfy to carry all day supplies with you. 5. I can feel and see the difference. Fully reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: KETI

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting juices ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and satisfying. Love the packaging that the juices comes in very conveniently lightweight and easy to store in freezer or fridge. Also love all the info indicated on each juice pack. Very very very delectable!! Healthy, best cleansing for weight lost. Lost 8lbs in 3 days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: The best juice cleanse I have tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I have done several cleanses, and I don't normally write reviews, but this was by far the easiest and best cleanse I have done. Hunger has always been a problem for me when doing a cleanse but having 8 juices a day plus lots of water and eating every two hours made it so that I was not hungry at all. Some of the juices tasted great, others were palatable, but none of them tasted bad. I lost 3 lbs doing the 3 day cleanse which I am very pleased about, but the best part is that my skin looks great and I feel more energized. Thank you LemonKind for making the best juice cleanse!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Detox Elite Brand
customer_reviews.text: This detox is great, it's more than enough juice to keep you full and going all day long. It tastes good and the packaging is quality. You definitely get what you're paying for, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Timkai

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cleanse! Each flavor was delicious. I love the fact you get 8 juices per day during this cleanse vs. only 6 intoners I have tried. I would definitely recommend Lemonkind if you are doing a cleanse for the first time. Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have done this cleanse and absolutely love it! The first day is the toughest but the second and third are a breeze! I do not find myself getting tired, hungry or crabby. There is only one drink taste wise I do not care for but the rest are great. Highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristenr2489

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I started at the top. First ever juice cleanse I did and it was magic. Every other juice cleanse (other brands) have not been as good or tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Pedram Foroutan

customer_reviews.title: Great taste !
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use these to detox all day. I did once and was very happy with it. Now I buy to have something to grab on the go that makes me feel energized
customer_reviews.author: Professional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Flavor was good variety was lacking
customer_reviews.text: Loved the set , boy oh boy did it cleanse you out. I didn't feel hungry. 3 days prior stopped carbs did salads and veggies. Taste was fine my only complaints they all tasted like apple juice, with a little something added except for the cinnamon one which wasn't good to me. It's the only thing you're ingesting besides water so a little variety would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Charissel824

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for people with a poor diet
customer_reviews.text: Everything tasted good but did absolutely nothing for me. Because of the high sugar and content, I experienced very high levels of inflammation. I eat a low sugar low carb diet with no processed foods so I am guessing this is why I didn't have a detox experience but did experience a lot of inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Superb Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite juice cleanse. The flavors are good, and it’s so worth it to spend extra for the ready to drink pouches. It works like a charm every time I use it. Comes with a cute carry bag, too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Como

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and sweet
customer_reviews.text: I like this Juice cleanse. I am a long time juicer and cleanser...I feel like they made it a little sweet to appeal to everybody. I ended up only drinking 4 to 6 each day so extended my cleanse by two more days by adding tea and extra water. I think this would be an easy program for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Smurfettenm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flavors which helps. Great price for the amount you get
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor, and easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, portable, tastes great. Will definitely use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Easier to do than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that giving up solid food for 3 days would be hard to do, but it was actually pretty easy! I think that drinking one every 2 hours kept the hunger away, and the flavors were really good. I did lose about 10 pounds after the 3 days were done and I felt really good too! I will be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love these juices. They taste great and don’t make you feel like crap while doing the cleanse. Great jump start to my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Angiepoo

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy detox
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised how easy it was to stick with this program. The juices were all great tasting and I never really had the chance to be hungry. Being around food wasn’t hard. Amazing product thanks!
customer_reviews.author: tla23

customer_reviews.title: JUICE CLEANSE
customer_reviews.text: I have done the 48 Hour Hollywood Diet & Beachbody 3 Day cleanse prior to this cleanse. I like this one a lot PROS - taste & taste variety - feel refreshed - premade CONS - not a big fan of the pouch & straw - sometimes air gets in when taking a sip and tastes like plastic & juice - I poured it into a cup instead - $$ - pricey but worth the money to me
customer_reviews.author: Denae

customer_reviews.title: Great fasting.
customer_reviews.text: Best 3-day fasting juices I’ve tried. Enjoyed the mixes and the order they suggest you drink them. Satisfying while not eating. Didn’t have ingredients that upset stomach or cause gas, as others can do.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juice  flavor awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I made this purchase we bought two sets .one for him one for me we tried it out for the three days ,The juice flavors are awesome honestly if I can drink it every single day all day I would . I did not see a weight difference but I did feel more alert wasn’t really hungry at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: This is my first juice cleanse - I was very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juice cleanse - I was very hesitant to try this even with all of the positive reviews. I happen to be a picky eater (which I’m hoping this cleanse opens me up to eating more veggies). However- i just had the first juice (awareness) and it was delicious! Excited to try the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joshua C. Brasher

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in the quality of the juices. Once I got them I realized most had apple or mango purée in them. They all pretty much tasted the same and were incredibly sweet, except the renew at night. For the money I wish I would have tried another brand for this cleanse because I was very underwhelmed. I am only giving this 3 stars because the customer service was excellent. When my juices arrived (completely room temp might I add which is super weird) one was busted and had spilled all over the box. I contacted the company, not amazon, and they overnighted a replacement juice and 4 additional juices and a tote for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: C. Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Really GREAT Juice Detox
customer_reviews.text: Box includes your 8, 12oz juice pouches. I found the taste of each to be very good. The program is set up to drink a pouch every two hours. I found this to be very easy, convenient and effective. Felt great after a 3 day detox. Will definitely use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: mmof2006

customer_reviews.title: DP
customer_reviews.text: This product really works, I did recomended it to my friends and they thanks me already !!!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Each of these drinks taste so fresh and amazing that I really enjoyed opening each new flavor as the day progressed. I would definitely recommend this product!! Feeling great!!!
customer_reviews.author: NonnaTX

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I do a juice fast often and this is so easy. Love the packaging. Taste great. Nice variety. Impressive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful taste
customer_reviews.text: I loved all but one of the drinks ( I just cannot stomach kale). I dropped 9 pounds in 3 days but have to admit that the afternoon of the 3rd day I was feeling pretty lousy. My energy levels dropped dramatically and was getting stomach cramps. I broke down and had a spinach salad with a little roast chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lack of direction
customer_reviews.text: I cannot write a review because all six boxes came without the pamphlets. It says there’s a pamphlet and it’s also on the outside of the box but it’s not.. I do not know what Order to drink them. I wanted to start tomorrow but I can’t because I don’t know in what order you supposed to drink these.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Convenient! Beneficial!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Well made product and the packaging is just too charming. I LOVED the fact that these came in pouches (rather than bottles) because I could smoosh these all into my insulated backpack and bring them all with me to work easily. I enjoyed a few slightly slushy, almost too delicious to consider "healthy". Having more options (8) per day definitely helps for active metabolisms. Definitely recommending to everyone and will order again myself for sure.
customer_reviews.author: lechicklet

customer_reviews.title: 3 rd time..  Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is my 3 rd time buying it. I like this cleanse. But this time it arived all broken. So Disappointed and sad because I can not return it or exchange it. They also change how they pack it and I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: The flavors were actually better than I expected! The presentation beautiful. Love the packaging. I feel clean and ready for healthy eating!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Delicious taste and easy to do
customer_reviews.text: It has a wonderful taste and it really works I use it once a month with my daughters we lost a lot of weight and kept it off highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: The feel good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I felt amazing when I was done. I will be using again. Love the product and the fact that it is organic.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Meekins

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, all of the flavors but one were tasty. Was never hungry, and made me more conscious of my eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: L. White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do! Completely planned out portions  with healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient packaging and the ingredients are of the highest quality. You do get nutritional substance when using this product. Far superior to other competitors products.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: It’s like hitting the “reset” button
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste, love the results! My fiancé and I lost over 5lbs each. Getting ready for the wedding week, and I know I’ll feel amazing because of this cleanse. It’s not our first time, we’ve done it once before and had good results. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Brizzi

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time using this product, I have done the three day cleanse and both times I've lost some weight. About 15lbs came off my second time doing the cleanse and I definitely feel healthier and have more energy. I would most definitely recommend this product to others, in fact I have a handful of people who are looking into buying.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a juice
customer_reviews.text: We bought two 3 day cleanse, one box was complete but the other is missing one of the juices “Strength”, I could not return because I was on my second day when I noticed I was missing one of juices. I feel cheated, is not right. Flavor and presentation is good but not good that I’m missing products.
customer_reviews.author: M E Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Felt great!
customer_reviews.text: I finished the cleanse and feel great. I didn't feel hungry or have cravings. Now that I am done I miss it, I really enjoyed every aspect of it.
customer_reviews.author: LeaAnn Smith

product_meta.title: LEMONKIND Metabolism Booster 3 Day Reset Cleanse for Healthy Weight Loss Jumpstart, Detox, Improved Digestion & Increased Energy – Plant-Based Superfoods, Non-GMO & Gluten-Free Certified - 24 Juices
feature_bullets: OUR 3-DAY CORE CLEANSE (1) Is a bad habit breaker, metabolism booster and diet jump-starter, (2) Allows you enough time to refocus your attention on better food choices and whole-body wellness and (3) Encourages the elimination of toxin build-up from your body that can slow down or inhibit fat burning.

PACK OF 24 FUNCTIONAL READY-TO-DRINK JUICES: (6) Infused Greens with Ginger and Chlorella Juices – Detox & Hydration Boost (6) Aronia Berry Lemonade with Organic Acerola Juices – Vitality & Immune Support (6) Alphonso Mango with Peppermint and Organic Green Tea 50% Polyphenols Juices – Energy & Immune Defense (1) Carrot Gingerade with Organic Turmeric Juices – Antioxidants & Immune Defense and (1) Blueberry with Organic Cinnamon and Chia Juices – Digestion & Sport Health.

HIGH POTENCY OF VITAMIN A & C + ANTIOXIDANTS: Fresh Pressed Pure Fruit and Vegetable Juices, Purees and Organic Botanicals, Non-GMO Project Verified, Gluten-Free Certified, Allergen-Free, Plant-based and Vegan. Never from concentrate.

SIMPLE SELF-CARE: Each recipe is rich in only the best whole foods, vitamins, minerals, enzymes and antioxidants to naturally promote healthy weight management as well as renewed & vitalized energy. NO ADDITIVES OF ANY KIND: All of our products are unsweetened and there are no additives of any kind - No Sugar or Syrups (Agave), Sulfites, Colors or Preservatives Added.
WOMAN OWNED BUSINESS CERTIFIED: Socially responsible, Non-Toxic, BPA Free, 100% Recyclable Packaging by Terracycle, Made with pride in USA. Our facilities are FDA, Gluten-Free and Organic certified.
